Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains Resume Stopping at Sox-35th Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains, in BOTH directions, have resumed making stops at Sox-35th station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains, in BOTH directions, have resumed making stops at Sox-35th station.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Roosevelt to 63rd/Dan Ryan in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #29 State buses and Green Line trains.

Allow extra travel time.
